"Grandma is so lovable that Richa wants to save money and buy an extra pair of glasses for her. 
Now let's meet Ramya. Ramya's grandmother thinks Ramya is so precious that she gifts her diamond earrings!
Wouldn't we love lovely, shiny diamond earrings? How exciting! 
And the diamonds in the earrings twinkled and shone so bright that Ramya thought they looked like stars.
As if Grandma had brought the stars down from the sky for her.
So what happened to the stars in the sky? What did Ramya think?"
You can listen again by clicking on the ► button.
